Docs.summary: Specifies whether a can be reevaluated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumeration is used to limit the number of times that a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> runs, primarily to prevent infinite loops. The default value for this field is `Always`. This means that the number of times the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> is run is not limited, and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> can be run as many times as determined by the chaining cycles in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> evaluation.
